item.title: Gate
item.description:
A mighty gate stands before you.

It is open.

The names of those who opened it are inscribed upon it.

  • Runs With Scissors ‚ù§Ô∏è Death becomes you
  • Cult of F ‚ù§Ô∏è Team Bwitan
  • Shadowfam ‚ù§Ô∏è TeamPoblano

item.title: About
item.description:
Community

If you aren’t already part of the PAX Community Discord, it’s worth a join! Therein you can find, of course, a #drexoskeleton channel, but I have it on good authority that other channels exist there too.

Contributing

The Exo Archive is a simple static Hugo site deployed via GitHub Pages. The source code lives in the tlake/exoskeleton-archive repository, and if you’re interested in helping contribute to the site (content-wise it’s pretty simple, just markdown files) there’s a document for that.
item.content:
Community

If you aren’t already part of the PAX Community Discord, it’s worth a join! Therein you can find, of course, a #drexoskeleton channel, but I have it on good authority that other channels exist there too.

Contributing

The Exo Archive is a simple static Hugo site deployed via GitHub Pages. The source code lives in the tlake/exoskeleton-archive repository, and if you’re interested in helping contribute to the site (content-wise it’s pretty simple, just markdown files) there’s a document for that.

If you have content you’d like to contribute but using git/github isn’t for you, we’d still love your help! Just get in touch with mechamoogle (contact info below).

Who are you?

mechamoogle

  • it me
  • “Essentia Chanterelle” team captain
  • “mechamoogle” on discord
  • @tlake@hachyderm.io on mastodon
